A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Almost every scene has something wrong with it. I really liked force awakens\, so it's not just the fact that it's a new movie\, and it's definitely not because I'm afraid of female lead roles. It pretty much scrapped episode 7 right out of the get go. From plot wholes to forced agendas to poorly timed jokes to time filling meaningless shots to killing off built up characters from the last movie\, this movie sucked.
